articles.description: Prince William and Prince Harry were extremely close growing up, before Kate Middleton and Meghan Markle joined the royal family, but things began to fall apart as they grew older
articles.content:
Despite choosing very different paths as they grew older, Princes William and Harry were extremely close throughout their 20s.
They worked together on huge charity projects, carried out joint offici… [+2801 chars]
